name: overfall
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of very rough water caused by a raised area in the ground under the water, or by the meeting of two currents (= movements of water in a particular direction): The water can throw up great overfalls, which small boats should try to avoid.
More examplesFewer examplesThe overfalls are huge and very dangerous.The sea was white from the massive overfalls.With its fierce currents and overfalls, this stretch of water is difficult to sail through. The area is notorious for its tidal overfalls and treacherous reefs.
